articles.title: National Meeting Marks Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Monday to celebrate the 74th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Attending it were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party and armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army, officials of organs, factories and enterprises in Pyongyang, those related to revolutionary activities of the great leaders, those who had the honor of being received by the great leaders, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs, working people, and scientists, technicians, workers and officials who contributed to the successful launch of Kwangmyongsong-4, overseas Koreans and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies, military attaches of foreign embassies here and other foreign guests.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, made a report.
					
					 The birth of Kim Jong Il as the Shining Star of Mt. Paektu meant a great fortune for Korea as it provided a bright future for the revolutionary cause of Juche, and marked a worldwide event which promised a rosy future of the cause of human independence, the reporter said, and went on: 
					
					 Kim Jong Il was a legendary great man and the eternal leader of revolution as he performed the greatest feats to shine long in the annals of the country despite the most arduous ordeals in history during the whole period of his revolutionary life.
					
					 He comprehensively reviewed the 100-year history of thought of the preceding working class and made a scientific clarification of the profundity, originality and great role of the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung in bringing about changes and thus made the Juche idea throw its rays as the guiding idea in the era of independence.
					
					 He developed in depth the President's idea of attaching importance to arms into the Songun revolutionary idea and Songun political theory and put forward the theory of building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 He gave encyclopedic answers to the theoretical and practical issues raised by the times, revolution and history, remarkably developing and enriching the treasured house of the Juche idea and indicating the road of accomplishing the cause of the  Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.
					
					 He developed the Workers' Party of Korea, state and army into the ones of the President.
					
					 He successfully carried forward the President's idea of attaching importance to youth and built the young people as the heroes of the times and the reliable reserves of the party and thus made the DPRK demonstrate its might as the youth power without an equal in the world.
					
					 He built the DPRK into a matchless military power. This is the eternal feat he performed for the country and revolution.
					
					 He ushered in a new era of the country's prosperity unprecedented in the national history spanning five thousand years with a grand plan to build the DPRK into the most dignified and rich and powerful socialist nation in the world. 
					
					 The historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration were provided and an epochal phase of the movement for national reunification advancing in the idea of By Our Nation Itself was opened thanks to his Songun politics of love for the country, nation and people.
					
					 He developed the foreign relations of the country onto a new high stage under the uplifted banner of independence, peace and friendship and thereby consolidated the international position of Songun Korea and made a great contribution to accomplishing the cause of human independence.
					
					 He successfully settled the issue of succession to the leadership for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche as required by the times and desired by the people. This is the greatest feat he performed for the party and revolution, the country and its people.
					
					 The reporter called upon all the service personnel and people to bring about new great changes in all fields of the revolution and construction and bring earlier the building of a thriving socialist nation, true to the lifelong intention and desire of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 His revolutionary career and feats will throw their rays forever and the DPRK will turn into the best country to fully demonstrate its dignity and might as Marshal Kim Jong Un is standing at the helm of the Songun revolution, the reporter concluded.

articles.title: Senior Party, State, Army Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Senior Party, State, Army Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Leading officials of the party, state and army visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Tuesday, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Among them were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju and other senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party and officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions.
					
					 Laid before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il was a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Central Military Commission of the WPK, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il before their statues.
					
					 At the hall where Kim Jong Il lies in state the visitors paid tribute to him.
					
					 They went round the room where the orders he received are on display, which is associated with the reverence of the Korean people and world progressives for him and halls that house a car, electric car, boat and train coach used by him during his field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of his life.
					
					 Meanwhile, service personnel and working people from all walks of life visited the palace to pay high tribute to Kim Jong Il on the same day.

articles.title: Banquet Given to Mark Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Banquet Given to Mark Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A banquet was given at the People's Palace of Culture Tuesday, the 74th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam Pak Pong Ju and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, officials of the army and society who set examples in carrying out the behests of Kim Jong Il and the party's policies, labor innovators, delegations of overseas Koreans and other compatriots staying in the socialist homeland on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here and their spouses, military attaches of foreign embassies here and their spouses and foreign guests.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), said in his speech that the life of Kim Jong Il is the one of the great revolutionary and a noble life of the peerless patriot who devoted his all to the country and people.
					
					 He called for holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal leader of the WPK and the Korean people and the sun of Juche, devotedly implementing his lifetime intention and behests and thus glorifying his revolutionary career and feats for all ages.
					
					 All the service personnel and people will glorify the noble tradition of devotedly defending the leader generation after generation and take the march of Paektu to the last, building a fortress of single-minded unity around Marshal Kim Jong Un, he added.
					
					 He said that only victory and glory are in store for the DPRK advancing under the leadership of the Marshal.

articles.title: Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory letter from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Tuesday, the 74th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 Officials of Chongryon and other Koreans in Japan, greeting the Day of the Shining Star, are missing Kim Jong Il very much with sincere gratitude to him, the letter said, adding:
					
					 The revolutionary career of the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il was the one of a peerless patriot and illustrious commander of Songun who dedicated himself to the road of high-intensity forced march for the prosperity of the country and happiness of its people, true to the noble intention of the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, and thus performed undying exploits to always go down in the history of the country and honorably defended the sovereignty of the country and the nation.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was an outstanding leader and guardian of the destiny of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan, who developed Chongryon into the leading patriotic organization, exemplary overseas Koreans organization of patriotism and loyalty, true to the noble intention of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Now the patriotic movement of Chongryon has entered a high stage under the outstanding leadership and care of the Marshal who is making the lifetime desire of Kim Jong Il a reality.
					
					 All the officials of Chongryon and other Koreans in Japan will wage an all-out offensive for adding glory to the great leaders' Juche-based idea of overseas compatriots movement and leadership exploits and for thoroughly implementing the important tasks set forth by the Marshal in a historic letter and New Year greetings.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from C.C., AINDF
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from C.C., AINDF
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a congratulatory message by the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) on Tuesday, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 The message said that Kim Jong Il was born on February 16, Juche 31 (1942) as the Shining Star on Mt. Paektu and this was a great auspicious event in the history of the nation as it guaranteed the carrying forward of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the rosy future of Kim Il Sung's Korea, and it was also a world historic event which opened up a bright prospect for the era of independence. 
					
					 The sacred life of Kim Jong Il is brilliantly shining as glorious and heroic epic of the peerless patriot and great man who weathered grave storms of the revolution and created the ever-victorious history of the cause of Juche, the cause of Songun revolution, and laid the strong foundation for prosperity of the nation while steering the era and history by tightly holding the helm, the message said, and went on:
					
					 During all his revolutionary life Kim Jong Il worked heart and soul in the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu and thus performed undying exploits for the country and the nation, era and history. He will always live in the hearts of all Koreans and other progressive peoples as the eternal image of the great Paektusan nation. 
					
					 The cause of the Juche revolution that started on Mt. Paektu has greeted an era of fresh leaping progress thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un, another peerless great man of our nation. 
					
					 The victory of the Korean people for independence, democracy and national reunification is inevitable and the day when all Koreans will live in a reunified, dignified and prosperous powerful country will surely come as there are precious patriotic legacy for reunification bequeathed by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, and the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Foreign Guests, Overseas Compatriots Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Foreign Guests, Overseas Compatriots Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Foreign diplomatic envoys, representatives of international bodies and military attaches of foreign embassies here, the delegation of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the congratulatory group of the General Association of Koreans in China and other foreigners and overseas compatriots visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun Tuesday, the Day of the Shining Star (the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il).
					 They paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il before their statues at the palace.
					
					 In the hall where Kim Jong Il lies in state the visitors made deep bows to him.
					
					 They went round the hall where orders he received are on display and the halls that house a car, electric car, boat and train coach used by him during his field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of his life.
					
					 On the same day, chief Jo Il Min and members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun and paid a tribute to Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from Chief Director of Italian Company
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from Chief Director of Italian Company
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Giancarlo Elia Valori, chief director of the Italian General Investment Group, sent a floral basket to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill.
					 The floral basket was laid before the statues on Tuesday.
					
					 On the same day staff members of the Chinese embassy here laid a floral basket before the statues of the great leaders on Mansu Hill.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statues, Portraits of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statues, Portraits of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Service personnel, people and school youth and children visited the statues of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and portraits of the smiling Generalissimos across the country and paid high tribute to them on Tuesday, the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il.
					 Service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youth and children visited the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill.
					
					 Seen before the statues was a floral basket sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Laid before the statues were floral baskets in the names of the party, armed forces and power bodies, public organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, institutions, enterprises, factories and schools at all levels in Pyongyang, and bouquets and flowers.
					
					 Also placed there was a floral basket in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to the statues.
					
					 Laid before the statues and portraits at Kim Il Sung University, Kim Il Sung Military University, Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, Ministry of People's Security, Mansudae Art Studio and other parts of Pyongyang were floral baskets in the names of units of the KPA, institutions and enterprises, and bouquets and flowers.
					
					 Service personnel, working people and school youth and children across the country paid tribute to the statues.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Tours Kimjongilia Festival
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Tours Kimjongilia Festival
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here Tuesday toured the venue of the 20th Kimjongilia Festival on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Military attaches looked round immortal flowers in full bloom amid the yearnings and reverence for him.

articles.title: DPRK Celebrates Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
DPRK Celebrates Day of Shining Star
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK celebrated the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Streets and villages of Pyongyang, every province, city and county and industrial establishments and farms are garbed in festive attire.
					
					 People visited the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun where President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state and made bows to the portraits of the smiling leaders.
					
					 They spent a good time at the park of the plaza which was built as a grand monument to the immortality of the leaders.
					
					 Service personnel, people and school youth and children across the country visited the statues of the great leaders and portraits of the smiling leaders.
					
					 An endless stream of people visited the venue of the 20th Kimjongilia Festival and venues of the Kimjongilia exhibitions in every province.
					
					 People from all walks of life visited the venues of photo exhibitions and art shows and looked round historic pictures and art works dealing with the revolutionary feats of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 There took place art performances at theaters, halls and outdoor stages in Pyongyang and local areas.
					
					 There were also art performances at the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, the construction site of the Chongchongang-Phyongnam irrigation gravity-fed waterway, the construction site of stockbreeding base in Sepho area, the Migok Co-op Farm in Sariwon City and other factories, rural villages and construction sites across the country.
					
					 Children across the country admitted the Korean Children's Union.
					
					 Public catering establishments including the Combined Service Boat Mujigae, Okryu Restaurant and Chongryu Restaurant are enlivened with holiday service.
					
					 People had a pleasant holiday time at the Rungna Dolphinarium, Rungna 4-D Simulation Cinema, People's Open-air Ice Rink and the Meari Shooting Gallery.
					
					 Youth and students held dancing parties.

articles.title: Fireworks Displayed Here
articles.content:
Fireworks Displayed Here
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Fireworks were displayed in Pyongyang on Tuesday evening to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Kim Il Sung Square, Mansu Hill, Okryu Bridge centering on the bank of the Taedong River where the Tower of the Juche Idea rises up and other places were crowded with the people from all walks of life and school youth and children.
					
					 At 20, the fireworks were displayed amid the playing of song "We Present You Bouquet of Best Wishes", representing amazing scenery.
					
					 Amid the playing of "The General Will Live Forever as the Sun" and other songs fireworks brightened the nocturnal sky.

articles.title: Joint National Meeting of KCU Organizations Held
articles.content:
Joint National Meeting of KCU Organizations Held
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union organizations (KCU) took place here on Tuesday, the 74th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were representatives of KCU organizations in provinces, schoolchildren here and those joining the KCU.
					
					 Present there on invitation were Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Su Gil, chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and officials of the youth league, war veterans and persons of merit.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the youth league, made a report.
					
					 The reporter said that February 16 is the auspicious day that provided the Korean people and school youth and children with the fortune of being blessed with illustrious leaders, and also a revolutionary holiday common to mankind which opened the bright road of realizing the cause of human independence. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il brought up the members of the KCU into reliable successors of the revolutionary cause of Juche with his loving care for the younger generations and the future throughout the whole period of his revolutionary leadership, the reporter noted.
					
					 He called upon all the members of the KCU to greet this year glorifying the 70th anniversary of the KCU with proud successes in acquiring knowledge, a good moral character and good health under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Then followed a new-member admission ceremony of the KCU. 
					
					 Led by Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, the newcomers took an oath.
					
					 Officials, war veterans and meritorious persons tied red neckerchiefs around the necks of those newcomers and pinned KCU's badges on their chests.
					
					 The newcomers made the first greetings of the KCU members, responding to the slogan "Always Be Ready for Socialist Country!"
					
					 Ji Yong Chun, lecturer of  the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, Pang Sung Son, principal of Pyongyang Secondary School No. 1, and Ri Se Gwang, gymnastic player of the April 25 Sports Team, made congratulatory speeches.
					
					 They asked all of the newcomers to grow up to be reliable successors of the Songun revolution faithful to Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth, Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth, Students Held
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students were held the DPRK on Feb. 16, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Dancing parties started with songs "We Will Hold Our General in High Esteem" and "People's Country" at the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding, the Arch of Triumph and the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and other places of the capital.
					
					 The dancers danced to the tune of songs in reflection of the reverence for Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They danced to the tune of songs "Victory Will Be Won Generation after Generation" and "Joy of the People", convinced that only victory and glory are in store for the great Paektusan nation as it is holding Marshal Kim Jong Un as the helm of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean revolution.
					
					 The dancing parties took place in provincial seats, cities and counties on the same day.

articles.title: Mansudae Art Troupe Gives Performance
articles.content:
Mansudae Art Troupe Gives Performance
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The Mansudae Art Troupe gave a music and dance performance "Song of Sun Will Be Forever" at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Tuesday, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Among the audience were officials of ministries and national institutions, service personnel and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 Also among the audience were delegations of overseas Koreans and other compatriots visiting the socialist homeland on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 The performance began with a prelude "February Waltz".
					
					 Put on the stage were such numbers as female solo and chorus "Cantata to Comrade Kim Jong Il" and chorus "General on a Galloping White Horse".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the feats he performed in providing the foundation for the eternal prosperity of the DPRK and happiness of the posterity and recording the history of the people-first principle.

articles.title: Performance Given by Chongbong Band of Wangjaesan Art Troupe
articles.content:
Performance Given by Chongbong Band of Wangjaesan Art Troupe
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- An art performance was given by the Chongbong Band of the Wangjaesan Art Troupe at the Ponghwa Art Theatre on Tuesday, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Among the audience were working people from all walks of life, youth and students in the capital.
					
					 The performance began with National Anthem. Put on the stage were famous songs praising the great man such as prelude "Cantata to Comrade Kim Jong Il", female chorus "Shine, Jong Il Peak", female quartet "His Life" and light music "General, Here Is the Forefront".
					
					 The performers truthfully represented the yearnings of the service personnel and people of the DPRK for Kim Jong Il who ushered in a new era of the country's prosperity unprecedented in the national history spanning five thousand years and guaranteed the eternal future of Juche Korea.
					
					 The performance goes on.

articles.title: Art Performance Given by Schoolchildren
articles.content:
Art Performance Given by Schoolchildren
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- An art performance was given by schoolchildren at the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace on Tuesday, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Among the spectators were Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the youth league, and other officials of the youth league and schoolchildren in the city.
					
					 The performers truthfully represented the yearnings and reverence for Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feat for Defending Socialism by Dint of Ideology
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feat for Defending Socialism by Dint of Ideology
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- On the Day of the Shining Star, the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il, the Korean people recall the undying feats he performed in defending socialism by dint of ideology.
					 The leader had regarded it as his lifelong mission to accomplish the socialist cause of Juche pioneered by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities, he formulated the Juche idea, the revolutionary idea of the President, as the guiding idea in the era of independence and set forth the ideas and theories proper for steering the rapidly-changing trend of the times.
					
					 He authored such celebrated works as "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable" and "Socialism Is a Science" to prove the validity and scientific accuracy of socialism and led all the people to hold fast to the Songun (military-first) idea as a treasured sword for invincibility in keeping with the requirement of the developing revolution.
					
					 And he advanced the ideas and theories on arming the popular masses with the socialist ideology and preserving the socialist principles and the true nature of socialism.
					
					 The leader had wisely guided the work to display the advantages of socialism in the revolution and construction.
					
					 He saw to it that everything should serve the people and all the problems should be settled by giving full play to the creative zeal of the popular masses. 
					
					 With the slogan "We serve the people!" as his maxim, he had made a ceaseless journey of devotion to the country's prosperity and the people's well-being until his heart stopped beating on a running train for field guidance.
					
					 His idea and leadership are now being creditably carried forward by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK Newspapers Praise Kim Jong Il as Sun of Juche
articles.content:
DPRK Newspapers Praise Kim Jong Il as Sun of Juche
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers Tuesday carry editorials on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Kim Jong Il is the eternal image of the great Paektusan nation and the sun of Juche who guaranteed the eternal future of the country and the nation.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's revolutionary history was the heroic epic of the outstanding leader, brilliant commander and peerless patriot who explored un-trodden path under the uplifted red flag of the revolution and devoted his all to the country and the people all his life.
					
					 He was born as the son of guerrillas in the deep forest of Paektu swept by blizzards, and was brought up in the flames of the anti-Japanese war. He acquired the wisdom of the commander by a table for operational plans at the supreme command during the Fatherland Liberation War. Then he conducted energetic revolutionary activities for decades to add glory to Korea.
					
					 Thanks to his unremitting forced march which was associated with brilliant wisdom, rare leadership ability and warm love for the people, the eternal foundations for the prosperity of the country and the nation were laid and the cradle of the people's life has been reliably defended by a powerful nuclear deterrent.
					
					 He devoted his all to the revolution, prosperity of the country and happiness of the people till the last moments of his life. Therefore, he has been praised as the greatest man boundlessly revered by the people, and his feats will be glorified along with the victorious advance of the great Paektusan nation.
					
					 The greatest feat he performed in opening up the eternal future of the great Paektusan nation is that he perfectly solved the important issue of carrying forward the leadership of the revolution. 
					
					 Minju Joson says calls for working hard to bring into a brilliant reality the lifetime intention and desire of Kim Jong Il, rallied close around Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful Launch of Kwangmyongsong-4 Hailed by Korean in China
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful Launch of Kwangmyongsong-4 Hailed by Korean in China
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nyo, chairperson of the Federation of Korean Young Nationals in China, said as follows regarding the successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 on Feb. 11:
					 My heart is pounding with excitement as a member of Kim Il Sung's Korea which ranked itself among satellite possessors.
					
					 I thank Marshal Kim Jong Un, a peerlessly great man, for bringing about today's victory by leading all the service personnel and people in the sacred struggle for implementing leader Kim Jong Il's behests.
					
					 I'd like to hug and congratulate the scientists, technicians and workers of the homeland who won this proud success despite setbacks and ordeals.
					
					 The successful launch, which dealt a telling blow to the U.S. imperialists, Japanese reactionaries and south Korean puppet clique who had been hell bent on doing harm to the DPRK, is pride and honor of Kim Il Sung's Korea.
					
					 All the young Korean nationals in China will bear this joy in their minds and creditably fulfill their missions as the young vanguard overseas on the road of loving the country and people true to the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, identical to Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Korean Film Shows Held Abroad
articles.content:
Korean Film Shows Held Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Korean film shows took place in Indonesia, Malaysia, Singapore, Angola, Algeria and Nigeria from Feb. 2 to 8 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 The participants watched films dealing with the revolutionary history and exploits of Kim Jong Il and other Korean films "2015, Year of Great Revolutionary Auspicious Events", "Masikryong Ski Resort", "Pyongyang Today", "Women Footballers of Songun Korea."
					
					 Personages of various circles and masses in relevant countries watched those films.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed in Ethiopia
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks were held by Ethiopian water project enterprises and hospitals from February 5 to 9 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).

articles.title: KPA Praised by Swiss Bodies
articles.content:
KPA Praised by Swiss Bodies
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The Swiss preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on Feb. 6 on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the development of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) into the regular revolutionary armed forces by President Kim Il Sung.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, after liberating Korea by defeating the Japanese imperialists, developed the KPRA into the regular army of an independent and sovereign state on Feb. 8, 1948.
					
					 Anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk faithfully aided the work of Kim Il Sung for developing the KPRA into the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					
					 The founding of the regular revolutionary armed forces was a historic landmark in the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Songun.
					
					 The KPA honorably defended the freedom and independence of the young DPRK by beating back the U.S. imperialists in the Fatherland Liberation War under the leadership of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, an iron-willed brilliant commander.
					
					 The KPA has grown to be an invincible army with strong combat capability and nuclear force under the wise leadership of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The KPA is reliably defending socialist Korea of Juche, Songun Korea, the fortress of world socialism.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed in Cuba
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed in Cuba
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A meeting, photo exhibition and film show took place at Kim Il Sung High School in Cuba under the co-sponsorship of the Cuban Institute of Friendship with the Peoples and the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification on February 11 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 On display at the venue of the events were photos showing the Songun revolutionary leadership exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed were photos of the service personnel and people of the DPRK struggling to achieve the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Juan Jose Leon, first vice-chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, in a speech said Kim Jong Il dedicated his all to socialist construction and independent and peaceful reunification of Korea, true to the idea and intention of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 We will struggle together with the Korean people until the day when the cause of Korea's reunification is accomplished as desired by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, he added.
					
					 Korean films were shown at the end of the meeting.

articles.title: DPRK's Satellite Launch Hailed by Pakistani Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK's Satellite Launch Hailed by Pakistani Organizations
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The launch of the satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 is a due exercise of the DPRK's independent right to use space for peaceful purposes.
					 The Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association and the Pakistan Association for Self-Reliance Studies noted this in their joint statement on Feb. 10 in congratulation of the successful launch of the satellite.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association and the Pakistan Association for Self-Reliance Studies send warm congratulations to the Korean people on successfully putting the newly developed earth observation satellite into its orbit according to the 2016 program for the five-year plan for national space development.
					
					 The launch of the satellite in the run-up to the auspicious Day of the Shining Star fully demonstrated the might of Juche and Songun and the space sci-tech level of the DPRK which has reached the ultra-modern phase.
					
					 We extend support and solidarity to the just cause of the Korean people, convinced that they would as ever achieve bigger success in the work for exploring space under the wise leadership of HE Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Liberation Front of Mozambique
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Liberation Front of Mozambique
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The Liberation Front of Mozambique sent a letter to the DPRK mission on Feb. 4 supporting the idea of national reunification advanced by Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					 Sincerely wishing all Koreans bigger progress in the new year, the letter noted:
					
					 We once again express our aspiration that the issues of the north-south relations and national reunification would be settled in a peaceful and friendly atmosphere between the north and the south in order to realize the wish of the Korean people for national reunification.
					
					 We hope that the new year would be a year of prosperity for the DPRK and our Korean brothers.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Dominica
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Dominica
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Hasten the Final Victory through a Revolutionary Ideological Offensive" was brought out in pamphlet by a publishing house of Dominica on February 8.
					 The speech, made by Kim Jong Un at the 8th Conference of Ideological Workers of the Workers' Party of Korea on Feb. 25, Juche 103 (2014), clarifies that the whole course of the Korean revolution can be called a period of ideological work to give full play to the might of the truth of the revolutionary ideas of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It also indicates tasks facing the field of the party's ideological work at present and ways of carrying out them.

articles.title: Acto central por 74o aniversario de natalicio de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Acto central por 74o aniversario de natalicio de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este lunes en el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang el acto central por el 74o aniversario de natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					Asistieron Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, funcionarios de los organismos del partido y las fuerzas armadas, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, funcionarios de las instituciones, fabricas y empresas en la capital, personas que tienen relaciones con el Dirigente o fueron recibidas por el, familiares de martires revolucionarios, trabajadores, cientificos, tecnicos, obreros y funcionarios quienes contribuyeron al lanzamiento exitoso del satelite artificial Kwangmyongsong-4, coreanos residentes en otros paises y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang. 
					
					Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales y los agregados militares, acreditados en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y otros huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					El informante dijo que el nacimiento del Dirigente como Estrella Luz del Paektu fue una gran fortuna de Corea y acontecimiento mundial que aseguro el radiante futuro de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y la verificacion de la independencia de la humanidad. 
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, gran hombre legendario y eterno lider de la revolucion, realizo durante toda su vida revolucionaria las mas grandes proezas a ser registradas en la historia de la patria superando las severas pruebas no vistas en la historia humana, subrayo y continuo:
					
					Balanceo globalmente la historia ideologica de un siglo de la clase obrera antecesora y aclaro de manera cientifica la profundidad, la originalidad y el papel transformador de la idea revolucionaria del Presidente Kim Il Sung, de modo que hizo de la idea Juche la guia directriz de la epoca de la independencia. 
					
					Presento la teoria de construccion de Estado prospero socialista desarrollando y profundizando la idea del Presidente de dar importancia a las fuerzas armadas como la idea revolucionaria y teoria politica del Songun. 
					
					Al dar las respuestas enciclopedicas a los problemas ideo-teoricos presentados por la epoca, la revolucion y la historia, enriquecio extraordinariamente el caudal de la idea Juche e ilumino el camino por el cumplimiento de la revolucion coreana y la causa de verificacion de la independencia en el mundo entero. 
					
					Fortalecio el partido, el Estado y el ejercito como los de Kim Il Sung. 
					
					Al continuar con brillantez la idea del Presidente Kim Il Sung de dar importancia a la juventud, formo a los jovenes como heroes de la epoca y reservas del partido, para que la RPDC exaltara su poderio de potencia de la juventud sin igual en el mundo. 
					
					Convirtio la RPDC en la potencia militar sin rival, lo cual deviene su inmortal proeza realizada ante la patria y la revolucion. 
					
					Con el grandioso proposito de fortalecer la RPDC como Estado prospero socialista mas digno y prospero en el mundo, abrio una nueva era de prosperidad de la patria no vista en la historia nacional de cinco milenios. 
					
					Gracias a su politica de Songun caracterizada por el amor a la patria, la nacion y el pueblo, fueron aprobadas la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, y se abrio la coyuntura de viraje del movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria, basado en el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales". 
					
					El Dirigente desarrollo en nueva etapa elevada las relaciones exteriores del pais manteniendo el principio de la independencia, la paz y la amistad. De esta manera, consolido la posicion internacional de la Corea del Songun e hizo gran aporte al cumplimiento de la causa de verificacion de la independencia de la humanidad. 
					
					Dio solucion perfecta al problema de sucesion de la direccion para el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche de acuerdo con la demanda de la epoca y la aspiracion del pueblo. Esto es la mas destacada de sus proezas realizadas ante el partido, la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo. 
					
					En acato al proposito y anhelo de toda la vida del Dirigente, todos los militares y civiles coreanos deben lograr nuevos y relevantes innovaciones en todos los dominios de la revolucion y la construccion y adelantar la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista.
					
					Gracias a tener al Mariscal Kim Jong Un al frente de la revolucion del Songun, brillaran eternamente la vida revolucionaria y las proezas del Dirigente y la RPDC manifestara su poderio y dignidad de la mejor potencia mundial.

articles.title: Cuadros rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Cuadros rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ACNC) -- En ocasion del dia de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo y los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, el Consejo de Ministros, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales visitaron este martes el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan.
					Ante las estatuas de pie de los grandes Lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, fue depositado un cesto de flores a nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Comite de Defensa Nacional, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Los participantes rindieron sublime homenaje a los grandes Lideres antecesores ante sus estatuas de pie y en el salon de eternidad donde esta conservado el cuerpo del Dirigente.
					
					Luego, pasaron revista a la sala de conservacion de las ordenes del Dirigente y las otras de conservacion de carro, coche electrico, barco y vagon de tren usados por este gran hombre hasta el ultimo periodo de su vida para las visitas de orientacion y viajes al extranjero.
					
					El mismo dia, los oficiales y los soldados del EPC y los trabajadores de distintos estratos visitaron el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan donde rindieron sublime homenaje al Dirigente.

articles.title: Tiene lugar banquete por 74o aniversario de natalicio de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tiene lugar banquete por 74o aniversario de natalicio de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este martes en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo un banquete por el 74o aniversario de natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					Asistieron alli Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, el Consejo de Ministros, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, los funcionarios de las unidades militares y sociales ejemplares en la materializacion del legado del Dirigente y las politicas del partido, los innovadores laborales, las delegaciones de los compatriotas en ultramar de visita en la patria socialista y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang. 
					
					Fueron invitados los matrimonios de los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales y los de agregados militares, acreditados en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y los huespedes extranjeros.
					
					Al hacer uso de la palabra, el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Ki Nam, dijo que la vida del Dirigente fue la mas noble del gran revolucionario y patriota sin igual que dedico todo lo suyo por la patria y el pueblo. 
					
					Insistio en la necesidad de enaltecer al Dirigente como eterno lider del PTC y el pueblo coreano y como Sol del Juche y materializar cabalmente su proposito y anhelo para glorificar generacion tras generacion la vida revolucionaria y las proezas de este gran hombre.
					
					Apunto que todos los militares y civiles coreanos, que forman la unidad monolitica en torno al Mariscal Kim Jong Un, continuaran generacion tras generacion la noble tradicion de defensa a ultranza al lider y la marcha iniciada en la selva del monte Paektu. 
					
					Concluyo que siempre habra victorias y glorias en el avance de la RPDC que marcha bajo la orientacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Coreanos rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en Da de Estrella Luz
articles.content:
Coreanos rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en Da de Estrella Luz 
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del da de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, los oficiales y soldados del Ejrcito Popular de Corea, trabajadores de distintos estratos, jvenes y nios escolares visitaron las estatuas de bronce y los retratos sonrientes de los grandes Lderes Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en todas partes de la Repblica Popular Democrtica de Corea.
					Ante las estatuas de bronce de los Generalsimos en la capitalina colina Mansu estaba colocado un cesto de flores enviado por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					En el mismo lugar fueron depositados los cestos, ramos y ramitas de flores a nombre de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y rganos centrales, unidades del EPC y del Ejrcito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los organismos, empresas, fbricas y escuelas a todos niveles en esta capital.
					
					Tambin fue puesto un cesto de flores a nombre de la sucursal del Frente Democrtico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang. 
					
					Los participantes rindieron tributo a los grandes Lderes antecesores.
					
					Las ceremonias de homenaje tuvieron lugar tambin ante las estatuas de bronce y los retratos sonrientes de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu en la Universidad 
					
					Kim Il Sung, la Academia Militar General Kim Il Sung, el Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el Ministerio de Seguridad del Pueblo, la Casa de Creacin Mansudae y otros lugares de esta capital y todas las localidades del pas.
